metadata.description: The location for the resources deployed in this solution.
The resource ID to an existing log analytics workspace. Ideally, utilizing the same workspace used for AVD Insights.
The Template Spec version ID that will be used to by the rip and replace AVD solution.

Set the following values if there are exisiting resource groups, automation accounts, or storage account that should be targeted. If values are not set a default naming convention will be used by resources created.

To be used with AVD solutions that deploy post configuration software. Set the following values if there is a storage account that should be targeted. If values are not set a default naming convention will be used by resources created.
Frequency of logic app trigger for Blob Check Logic App.
Interval of logic app trigger for Blob Check Logic App.
Host pool resource group name to target.
Session host resource group name to target.
Frequency of logic app trigger for Image Check Logic App.
Interval of logic app trigger for Image Check Logic App.
E-mail contact or group used by logic app approval workflow.
The target maintenance window day for AVD
The target maintenance window week occurrence for AVD
The target maintenance window start time for AVD

Message.Subject: New Image Version Found for AVD Hostpool Environment - @{body('Parse_Session_Host_VM_and_RG')?['hostPool']}. Please Approve or Reject Creating Automated Schedule for Updating AVD Environment

container.value: [if(parameters('new'), format('{0}/default/{1}', if(parameters('new'), parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('storageAccountName')), parameters('containerName')), format('{0}/default/{1}', if(parameters('new'), parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('storageAccountName')), parameters('containerName')))]

Message.Subject: Software Update Found for AVD Hostpool Environment - Please Approve or Reject the Rip and Replace of the AVD Environment

logAlerts.name: AVD Rip and Replace Failed
logAlerts.description: The AVD Rip & Replace solution successfully added new session host to the specified AVD host pool.

allOf.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION"
| where Category  == "JobStreams"
| where ResultDescription has "AVD Rip & Replace failed"

logAlerts.name: AVD Rip and Replace Succeeded
logAlerts.description: The AVD Rip & Replace solution successfully added new session host to the specified AVD host pool.

allOf.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION"
| where Category  == "JobStreams"
| where ResultDescription has "AVD Rip & Replace succeeded"

logAlerts.name: New Image Found for AVD Environment
logAlerts.description: New Image Found for AVD Environment. Please close this alert to act as approval in workflow.

allOf.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION"
| where Category == "JobStreams"
| extend jsonResourceDescription = parse_json(ResultDescription)
| where jsonResourceDescription.NewImageFound == true

logAlerts.name: [format('New blob uploaded to container on {0}', parameters('storageAccount'))]
logAlerts.description: [format('New Blob Uploaded to AVD container on {0}. Please close this alert to act as approval in workflow.', parameters('storageAccount'))]
